'''Garry''' is the father of [[Jenna]].

==History==
Garry came into the practice with his daughter, Jenna, who was dying of cancer and wanted a baby as her last wish. They retrieved her eggs and got a sperm sample from her husband, [[Nick (Let It Go)|Nick]], and fertilized one of her eggs. However, Nick confessed that he didn't really want a baby and was only doing it because Jenna wanted it so badly.

When Nick didn't come home that night, Jenna decided to go ahead with the pregnancy with a sperm donor with her parents' support. However, Naomi said she couldn't do it, because what they all really wanted was for Jenna not to be dying. Nick agreed, saying he didn't want a baby, but he did want Jenna.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to [[Lynn (Let It Go)|Lynn]].

===Familial===
His only daughter, Jenna, is dying of cancer. Desperate to keep a part of her alive, her parents supported her decision to try to have a baby.
